channel.title: Solved
channel.description:
I am looking into making a whole chunk of area a Multi-PK Zone and a zone in the same area just a one on one pk area.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5sGVZ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/9Fhsv.png[/img]
What and/or how will I be able to do this to my server.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Solved
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“Int Bauk, post:2, topic:475421”]by using a boolean:

public boolean Location(int x, int y, int x1, int y1) { if (absX > x && absX < x1 && absY < y && absY > y1) { return true; } return false; }[/quote]Thanks, I just figured it out, was just about to close this thread

Read full topic

item.title: Solved
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

by using a boolean:

public boolean Location(int x, int y, int x1, int y1) { if (absX > x && absX < x1 && absY < y && absY > y1) { return true; } return false; }

Read full topic
